text: goal phslookups provide helper functions easily access use lookups provided analysis.

text: can install latest version phslookups GitHub : yet available PHS Posit Package Manager, never available CRAN intended internal package.

title: PHS Lookups

what: Get the HSCP Locality lookup — get_hscp_locality
title: Get the HSCP Locality lookup — get_hscp_locality
Get the HSCP Locality lookup — get_hscp_locality
Get the HSCP Locality lookup — get_hscp_locality
text: version Default "latest", otherwise supply date e.g. "20230804" col_select Columns include results. can use mini-language dplyr::select() refer columns name. Use c() use one selection expression. Although usage less common, col_select also accepts numeric column index. See ?tidyselect::language full details selection language.

title: Get the HSCP Locality lookup — get_hscp_locality
Get the HSCP Locality lookup — get_hscp_locality
code: get_hscp_locality() #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/conf/linkage/output/lookups/Unicode/Geography/HSCP Locality': no such file or directory

what: Get a SIMD DataZone Lookup — get_simd_datazone
title: Get a SIMD DataZone Lookup — get_simd_datazone
Get a SIMD DataZone Lookup — get_simd_datazone
Get a SIMD DataZone Lookup — get_simd_datazone
text: datazone_version Default "latest", otherwise supply year e.g. "2011" simd_version Default "latest", otherwise supply version e.g. "2020v2" col_select Columns include results. can use mini-language dplyr::select() refer columns name. Use c() use one selection expression. Although usage less common, col_select also accepts numeric column index. See ?tidyselect::language full details selection language.

title: Get a SIMD DataZone Lookup — get_simd_datazone
Get a SIMD DataZone Lookup — get_simd_datazone
code: get_simd_datazone() #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/conf/linkage/output/lookups/Unicode/Deprivation': no such file or directory

what: Get a SIMD Postcode Lookup — get_simd_postcode
title: Get a SIMD Postcode Lookup — get_simd_postcode
Get a SIMD Postcode Lookup — get_simd_postcode
Get a SIMD Postcode Lookup — get_simd_postcode
text: postcode_version Default "latest", otherwise supply tag e.g. "2023_2" simd_version Default "latest", otherwise supply version e.g. "2020v2" col_select character vector column names keep, "select" argument data.table::fread(), tidy selection specification columns, used dplyr::select().

title: Get a SIMD Postcode Lookup — get_simd_postcode
Get a SIMD Postcode Lookup — get_simd_postcode
code: get_simd_postcode() #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/conf/linkage/output/lookups/Unicode/Deprivation': no such file or directory get_simd_postcode(col_select = c("pc7", "simd2020v2_rank")) #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/conf/linkage/output/lookups/Unicode/Deprivation': no such file or directory

what: Get the Scottish Postcode Directory — get_spd
title: Get the Scottish Postcode Directory — get_spd
text: Read Scottish Postcode Directory (SPD) lookup file tibble.

title: Get the Scottish Postcode Directory — get_spd
Get the Scottish Postcode Directory — get_spd
text: version string defining version read . default value "latest" latest SPD file available cl-loaded. Alternatively can supply tag, e.g. "2023_2", load specific file. col_select character vector column names keep, "select" argument data.table::fread(), tidy selection specification columns, used dplyr::select().

title: Get the Scottish Postcode Directory — get_spd
text: tibble Scottish Postcode Directory lookup file selected columns.

title: Get the Scottish Postcode Directory — get_spd
code: get_spd() #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/conf/linkage/output/lookups/Unicode/Geography/Scottish Postcode Directory': no such file or directory get_spd(version = "2023_2", col_select = c("pc7", "latitude", "longitude")) #> Error: ✖ SPD version "2023_2" is NOT available #> ℹ Contact phs.geography@phs.scot

title: phslookups (development version)
